titleStmt.title: Divine love spreading forth over all nations, or, The glorious day of unity, peace, and concord tendered unto all the meek of the earth given forth from a tender compassion to the captivated seed of the noble plant of renown ... / by Humphrey Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

titleStmt.title: Divine love spreading forth over all nations, or, The glorious day of unity, peace, and concord tendered unto all the meek of the earth given forth from a tender compassion to the captivated seed of the noble plant of renown ... / by Humphrey Smith.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Humphrey, d. 1663.

notesStmt.note: "This to go among them called heathens, gentiles, Jews, Turks, infidels, and all sorts of nations upon the earth."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
